reviewText: Cheap knock off of "Man on Fire"...are we now saying Amitabh is equal to Denzel?

This movie apparently did quite badly in India and overseas... Can't understand it! Amitabh was fantastic - Arjun wonderful. I especially loved the "Kung-Fu" fight scene. The music that accompanied it was sharp, satirical, and moving - quite apt!
Loved the ending - had a real "Bollywood" twist to it! Loved it!
